sourcesContent:
import { StyleSheet,  View, Image,ScrollView , Text,TouchableOpacity } from 'react-native'
import React from 'react'

const CategoriesList =()=>{

    return(
            <>
            <Text style={styles.text} >Categories</Text>           
                       <ScrollView  horizontal={true} showsHorizontalScrollIndicator={false}  >
                 <TouchableOpacity>
                 <Image  style={styles.ImgCategories} source={require('../../assets/categories/phone.jpg')}/>
                </TouchableOpacity> 
                <TouchableOpacity>
                <Image style={styles.ImgCategories} source={require('../../assets/categories/computer.png')}/>
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <TouchableOpacity>
                 <Image style={styles.ImgCategories} source={require('../../assets/categories/tv.png')}/>
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <TouchableOpacity> 
                <Image style={styles.ImgCategories} source={require('../../assets/categories/earbuds.png')}/>
                 </TouchableOpacity>
                 <TouchableOpacity>
                 <Image style={styles.ImgCategories} source={require('../../assets/categories/keyboard.png')}/>
                 </TouchableOpacity>
                 <TouchableOpacity>
                 <Image style={styles.ImgCategories} source={require('../../assets/categories/mouse.png')}/>
                 </TouchableOpacity>
                 <TouchableOpacity>
                 <Image style={styles.ImgCategories} source={require('../../assets/categories/charger.png')}/>
                 </TouchableOpacity>


        </ScrollView>
        </>
    )


}

export default function Categories() {
  return (
    <View style={styles.container} >
      <CategoriesList/>
    </View>
  )
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    text:{
      fontSize:20,
      padding:5,
      color:'#0077b6',
      width:'30%',
      textAlign:'center',
      borderRadius:5,
      fontWeight:'bold'
     

        },
    
    ImgCategories:{
      
      backgroundColor:'#fff',
      resizeMode:'contain',
      width:60,
      height:60,
      alignItems:'center',
      alignSelf:'center',
      margin:5,
      borderRadius:20
      
    }
})
